name: Skull Golf - Creation in Decay
description:
Skull Golf is a game jam game for Wednesdevs#2 with the theme Creation in Decay.

You putt a little skull around on small courses, creating symbols with your trail. Diversifiers for the jam:  One to avoid - Make a game in a genre you do not like. Extra points if you can add a twist that makes it enjoyable to you. Bi Shade - You may only use two colours.

Arrow Keys - Aim the skull
Z/Y - Shoot
X - Reset the Level
